title: New client file download size
body: Ok yes I know it's a weird question. But I have slow internet and I'm wanting to figure out the best time to download the new client. Any help will be appreciated thanks!

replies.body: I have a ques, can we download the files part by part? Eg. 1gb today, and another 1 gb tomorrow? I have limited 4gb internet per day

Unfortunately, I can't confirm the exact download size for the Beta Client's newest version. It shouldn't be more than a few gigabytes, though. You can let the upgrade run overnight if it takes a while. Let me know if you run into any issues with your upgrade!
i have just downloaded the game and finished the update but when i log in the play button gives me 13 GB download is it normal or i should reinstall the game ?
Me too, they say its around 3-4gb but hell its around 13 for me..
